DOC.brief_summary: This research aims to investigate the correlation between tumor temperature difference and biological factors, such as size, metabolism, treatment response, and tumor aggressiveness. In addition, normal tissue response to radiation therapy in treated organ will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Monitoring HDR Brachytherapy for Cervical Cancer by Optic and Thermal Imaging
DOC.criteria: signed informed consent biopsy proven cervical cancer which will undergo definitive radiation not eligible to sign informed consent
